content.title: UAE to open an embassy in Zimbabwe - IOL
content.desc: Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan issued several federal decrees to establish the UAE Embassy in Zimbabwe.

content.title: Pope Francis to visit UAE in historic trip to the Gulf - News24
content.desc: Pope Francis will make a historic visit to Abu Dhabi in the United Arab Emirates in February to attend an interfaith meeting, the Vatican announces.

content.title: Founder of UAE, Madiba share legacy | Pretoria News - Independent Online
content.desc: Brings together the legacies of Nelson Mandela and the UAE founding father, His Highness Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nahyan.
